Description: Large marl pottery storage jar with rounded base, conical body becoming convex at the shoulder, with inset low neck and everted rim.
Curator's comments: Illustrated in W.M.F Petrie and A.C. Mace, Diospolis Parva, London (1901), pl. xviii.36c; Late ware L36p in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
